backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three FinalCtaSection-related updates to their referenced files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining global OKLCH theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO meta tags, font preconnects, and script mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Registers routes and renders them inside AppLayout with an ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamMember: Responsive team member row with optional reversed layout and fallback image handling.
frontend/src/components/common/NumberTic: Animated number ticker using IntersectionObserver to start counting when visible.
frontend/src/components/contact/ServiceS: Accordion dropdown for selecting a legal service with validation styling and controlled state.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Class-based error boundary showing a fallback card UI with reload option on errors.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with contact info, social links, and hash-aware quick-link navigation logic.
frontend/src/components/home/AboutApproa: Renders an About and Our Approach section with descriptive text and a button that navigates to the About page.
Displays an interactive FAQ accordion and injects FAQ structured data using JSON-LD.
frontend/src/components/home/FinalCtaSec: Provides a final call‑to‑action encouraging consultation scheduling with logic to navigate or scroll to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Shows the homepage hero with headline, CTA buttons, and navigation logic to the contact page or form.
Implements a responsive navbar with scrolling behavior, section navigation, mobile menu, and contact button.
frontend/src/components/home/HowItWorksS: Displays a five‑step vertical process describing how the firm supports clients.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersSec: Renders a grid of partner organizations with names and categories using styled badges.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesSec: Renders a services grid with icons and navigation handlers for exploring services or scrolling to contact.
frontend/src/components/home/Testimonial: Displays a grid of testimonial cards with quotes, names, and roles.
frontend/src/components/home/TrustIntroS: Shows animated trust indicators with icons and number tickers highlighting experience metrics.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with a navbar and handles smooth scrolling to hash targets on navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useNumberTicker.ts: Implements a smooth animated counter that ticks to a target number when visible.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes actor and fetching state as a placeholder for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, typography, component classes, and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with values, team members, and features, including navigation handlers to other pages.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a consultation form with validation, submission simulation, and UI sections for contact details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage by assembling multiple section components and a footer.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 page with message and button to navigate back home.
frontend/src/pages/servicesData.ts: Exports an array of service definitions with icons, names, and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a services overview using servicesData and includes a CTA to contact the firm.
frontend/src/router/router.ts: Implements a custom client-side router with route registration, navigation, and subscription support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended theme values, plugins, and custom colors, fonts, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, including existing features, new feature requests, and metadata about the homepage CTA section updates.
